title: How to Get Free Apple Music (Even If You’ve Already Tried It)

steps.title: New subscribers qualify for a free one-month trial of Apple Music.
steps.content: New subscribers qualify for a free one-month trial of Apple Music. To get your free month of Apple Music, install the app and follow the on-screen instructions. You can also visit https://www.apple.com/apple-music/ and click Try it free under "1 month free for new subscribers." This offer is only available if you haven't subscribed to Apple Music or used a free trial before. It may work if enough time has passed since you were last an Apple Music subscriber.

steps.title: New users get 3 free months for the 2024/2025 holiday season.
steps.content: New users get 3 free months for the 2024/2025 holiday season. If you aren't an existing customer, you can get a free 3-month Apple Music trial by opening the Apple Music app on your iPhone, iPad, Android, or Mac, logging in with your Apple account, and tapping Accept Now . This offer expires January 7, 2025, so be sure to redeem it before that date.

steps.title: Apple often has secret promotions for new customers.
steps.content: Apple often has secret promotions for new customers. Right now, you can get 3 free months of Apple Music as a new subscriber when you set up your new Apple device. Simply set up your new iPhone, iPad, or other Apple device, then open the Apple Music app on it. You'll see the 3-month offer right away or by tapping the Home tab. Tap Accept to get started. [1] X Research source If you have new Airpods, a HomePod, or Beats headphones, you can still redeem this offer by pairing the device with an iPhone or iPad updated with the latest iOS. If you have a new Apple Watch, pair it with an iPhone that has the latest iOS installed on it.

steps.title: Scan the code on the Shazam website for 2 free months of Apple Music.
steps.content: Scan the code on the Shazam website for 2 free months of Apple Music. Some people have had success using this code after redeeming free trials in the past, but it may only work for new subscribers at the moment. Head over to https://www.shazam.com/applemusic and scan the QR code to claim your free Apple Music subscription.

steps.title: Get 2 free months of Apple Music by redeeming this offer from American Airlines.
steps.content: Get 2 free months of Apple Music by redeeming this offer from American Airlines. Go to https://entertainment.aa.com/en/apple-music and click Redeem 2 Free Months Now. [2] X Research source You may also be able to redeem this offer if you've used a trial or paid for a subscription in the past, but not if you're a current subscriber.

steps.title: Djay, a DJing app, offers up to 2 free months of Apple Music.
steps.content: Djay, a DJing app, offers up to 2 free months of Apple Music. If you've ever used a free trial or paid for Apple Music in the past, you'll only get 1 month free, but new subscribers will get 2 months free. [3] X Research source Just install the Djay by Algoriddim app from the App Store, and you'll see your free Apple Music offer. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Adding $25 or more to your App Store accounts gets you 1-2 free months of Apple Music.
steps.content: Adding $25 or more to your App Store accounts gets you 1-2 free months of Apple Music. This offer will only work if you do not currently subscribe to Apple Music. If you're brand new to Apple Music, you'll get 2 free months. Returning subscribers will only get 1 month free. Here's how to redeem the offer: Open the App Store and tap your profile picture or initials at the top-right. Tap Add Money to Account . [5] X Research source If the free Apple Music offer is available, you'll see something like "Add $25 or more and get 2 months of Apple Music free."

steps.title: Get free Apple Music for 6 months by installing the PS5 app.
steps.content: Get free Apple Music for 6 months by installing the PS5 app. This offer will expire in November 2024, so you'll need to act fast. As long as you aren't a current Apple Music subscriber, you can get 6 free months of Apple Music by installing the Apple Music app on your PlayStation 5. Just open the app and follow the on-screen instructions to redeem the offer.

steps.title: Buying a new Apple device gets you 3 free months of Apple Music.
steps.content: Buying a new Apple device gets you 3 free months of Apple Music. This offer is only good if you haven't used an Apple Music trial before. If you buy a new iPhone, iPad, Mac, AirPods, Apple TV, HomePods, or even Beats headphones or speakers, you'll get 3 free months of Apple Music with your purchase. To redeem the offer, connect your new device, open the Apple Music app on your iPhone, iPad, Mac, or Apple TV, and select Accept Now . [6] X Research source

steps.title: Best Buy offers 3 months of free Apple Music on their website.
steps.content: Best Buy offers 3 months of free Apple Music on their website. This offer will work whether you're a new subscriber or you've already had a subscription. There is no need to make any purchases—just head over to Best Buy's free Apple Music offer, add it to your cart, and check out to receive your offer. [7] X Research source

steps.title: This free Target membership gets you 2 free months of Apple Music.
steps.content: This free Target membership gets you 2 free months of Apple Music. Whether you're new to Apple Music or you had a subscription or trial in the past, you can get a free two-month subscription just for joining Target Circle. It's free to join—just download the Target app on your phone or tablet, or visit the Target Circle website and click Join Target Circle . Once you're a Target Circle member, go to https://www.target.com/circle/partners/3001 and click Redeem now to get your free Apple Music subscription.

steps.title: Get up to 3 free months of Apple Music in the United Kingdom.
steps.content: Get up to 3 free months of Apple Music in the United Kingdom. As long as you aren't currently subscribed to Apple Music, you can head to https://redeem.services.apple/idmobile-uk-mus-2m?rt=OCpage and click Redeem Now to get 3 months for free for new subscribers or 2 months for returning subscribers. This offer is not available outside the UK and expires 03/03/2025. [8] X Research source

steps.title: There are multiple free Apple Music offers available to EE customers.
steps.content: There are multiple free Apple Music offers available to EE customers. If your plan supports Inclusive Extras, you can add Apple Music as your Inclusive Extra to get it for free. [9] X Research source If not, or if you have to pay for that, you can get Apple Music free for 6 months by texting the word MUSIC to 150. You'll receive a text message with instructions on how to activate your offer. You can only activate the 6 free months of Apple Music if you're a current EE customer and do not have an active Apple Music subscription. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Orange subscribers get Apple Music free for 6 months.
steps.content: Orange subscribers get Apple Music free for 6 months. Switch your mobile service to Orange to get all sorts of free perks, including Apple Music. If you already have Orange mobile service and haven't received instructions for getting Apple Music for free, go to https://www.orange.es/servicios/apple and click Lo quiero under "Quiero disfrutar de Apple Music."

steps.title: If you live in United Arab Emirates, iStyle is offering free Apple Music.
steps.content: If you live in United Arab Emirates, iStyle is offering free Apple Music. This offer is only good if your Apple ID is registered in UAE. All you'll need to do is sign up for their email list at https://istyle.ae/apple-services . If you've never used Apple Music before, you'll get 3 months for free. If you have ever used a free trial or paid for a subscription, you'll get 2 free months. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Certain Walmart purchases qualify for up to 4 months of free Apple Music.
steps.content: Certain Walmart purchases qualify for up to 4 months of free Apple Music. This doesn't apply to online purchases, just certain in-store purchases. When you buy a qualifying item, your printed receipt will contain a redemption code for free Apple Music, whether you're a new or returning subscriber. Just visit https://www.wmt-offer.com and enter the code from your receipt to redeem your free Apple Music subscription. [12] X Research source Unfortunately, Walmart doesn't publicize which products qualify.

steps.title: Verizon's Unlimited Ultimate plan comes with free Apple Music.
steps.content: Verizon's Unlimited Ultimate plan comes with free Apple Music. As long as you have an iPhone that works on the Verizon network, you can subscribe to this plan, which instantly gives you access to Apple Music, Apple TV+, Apple Arcade, and iCloud+ for free. Learn more about this plan at https://www.verizon.com/plans/unlimited .

steps.title: Canadian residents can get 6 free months of Apple Music upon activation.
steps.content: Canadian residents can get 6 free months of Apple Music upon activation. If you switch to a Rogers Infinite plan, you can redeem your free 6 months of Apple Music—even if you're a current Apple Music subscriber. [13] X Research source Once your plan is active, you'll receive a text from Rogers containing a link to redeem the promotion and link your Apple ID. If you already subscribe to Apple Music, the Rogers prompts will help you cancel your existing subscription and activate your 6 free months. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Students who sign up through UNiDAYS get a free month of Apple Music and Apple TV+.
steps.content: Students who sign up through UNiDAYS get a free month of Apple Music and Apple TV+. You must be able to prove your student status through UNiDAYS to qualify, which you can do by connecting from your college Wi-Fi network or providing your .edu email address. [15] X Research source To get started, go to https://www.myunidays.com/US/en-US/partners/applemusic/view and click Get Now under "Get 1 month Apple Music free." After the trial ends, you can keep your membership and only pay half-price (the student rate). You can also get other discounts through UNiDAYS, including MAX , Disney+ , and sometimes Audible .

steps.title: A Walmart+ subscription may come with a free Apple Music trial.
steps.content: A Walmart+ subscription may come with a free Apple Music trial. This offer was popular in the first half of 2024, but at the moment, the only Apple-related free perks are a 5-month free subscription to Apple Arcade and 3 free months of Apple News. [16] X Research source Because Walmart partners with Apple, it's likely the Apple Music offer will return in the future, so visit https://plus.walmart.com and check the "Limited-time offers" section.

steps.title: Apple may offer you additional free months if you cancel your service.
steps.content: Apple may offer you additional free months if you cancel your service. This isn't guaranteed, but you can try it if you're already a subscriber. You can cancel Apple Music in the Settings app by tapping your name at the top, selecting Subscriptions , choosing Apple Music , and then Cancel or Cancel Free Trial . Once canceled, you may receive an email or prompt asking if you'll reconsider for an extra month or two of free service.

steps.title: If you know someone with Apple Music Family, ask them to invite you.
steps.content: If you know someone with Apple Music Family, ask them to invite you. Apple Music Family is a subscription plan that allows a family organizer to share their Apple Music subscription with up to 5 more people. [17] X Research source If someone has an extra spot in their family, they can invite you to their family and you'll instantly get free access to Apple Music.
